SQLDataSource.Author: IFS RnD
SQLDataSource.Name: IND_SHIPMENT_MANAGEMENT_INVENTORY_PARTS_IN_SHIPMENT_INVENTORY
SQLDataSource.Where: ('$COMPANY$' IS NULL OR(NVL(&AO.COMPANY_SITE_API.GET_COMPANY(contract), '%') LIKE '$COMPANY$')) AND ('$SITE$' IS NULL OR (NVL(contract, '%') LIKE '$SITE$')) AND ('$STATUS$' IS NULL OR (NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_STATE(shipment_id), 'N/A') LIKE '$STATUS$')) AND ('$RECEIVER_ID$' IS NULL OR (NVL(receiver_id, '%') LIKE '$RECEIVER_ID$')) AND ('$NEXT_STEP$' IS NULL OR (NVL(NVL(&AO.Shipment_Flow_API.Get_Next_Step(shipment_id), 'N/A'), '%') LIKE '$NEXT_STEP$')) AND ('$SHIPMENT_TYPE$' IS NULL OR (NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_SHIPMENT_TYPE(shipment_id), '%') LIKE '$SHIPMENT_TYPE$')) AND ('$FORWARDER$' IS NULL OR (NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_FORWARD_AGENT_ID(shipment_id), 'N/A') LIKE '$FORWARDER$')) AND ('$ROUTE$' IS NULL OR (NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_ROUTE_ID(shipment_id), 'N/A') LIKE '$ROUTE$')) AND ('$DELIVERY_TERMS$' IS NULL OR (NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_DELIVERY_TERMS(shipment_id), 'N/A') LIKE '$DELIVERY_TERMS$')) AND ('$SHIP_VIA$' IS NULL OR (NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_SHIP_VIA_CODE(shipment_id), 'N/A') LIKE '$SHIP_VIA$')) AND ('$SHIPMENT_ID$' IS NULL OR (shipment_id LIKE '$SHIPMENT_ID$')) AND ('$CONSOLIDATED_SHIPMENT_ID$' IS NULL OR (NVL(TO_CHAR(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_PARENT_CONSOL_SHIPMENT_ID(shipment_id)), 'N/A') LIKE '$CONSOLIDATED_SHIPMENT_ID$'))
